text: kraoyomk a l laoh ban banhchoun satv kaek muoy mk kkay dei daembi aoy ke( k pel) kheunh rbieb kb sakasap baaun robsa ke . ke ban tauo nh tae tha changrei haey khnhom. tae hetoaveibeanchea khnhom asamotthaphap min ach thveu dauch satv kaek nih daembi banhchouh sakasap baaun robsakhnhom ban? banteabmk ke ka klaytowchea anak del sthetnow knongchamnaom puok del saokasday
